page_text:
Under the big, leafy tree, Luna stood tall, 
Gathering flowers, she called to them all. 
"Stay close, my friends, we’ll be alright, 
I’ll keep you safe through the stormy night." 
Rose and Sunny snuggled near, 
Together they laughed, chasing away fear.
text_placement_suggestion: bottom right, under the image of Luna and the tree
